nodes.title: Support latest source version in Javadoc processor
Verify trust certificate is present when SSL enabled
Allow configuring retry on a per method basis
Log unhandled exceptions from server methods
Fail only single request on too large frame
Add delay before retrying same address
Use helper method for creating thread factory
Check if pooled connection is still open
Add integration test for client frame size limit
Do not retry requests when response is too long
Add support for skipping the float type
Enable Netty connection pooling by default
Use netty resource tracking in TestingPooledByteBufAllocator to print leak details.
Support primitive optional classes in ThriftCatalog
Remove failed connections from connection pool
Fix retry for Netty network errors
Support simpler annotations for Thrift exceptions
Only try each address once per invoation
Fix exception classifer for Thrift application exceptions
Add constructors for server transport classes
Retry all transport exceptions for idempotent methods
Use Guava FluentFuture to simplify ThriftServerHandler
Improve Netty connection pool and buffer leak detection
Enable Netty leak detection for tests
Allow overriding IDL name for services
Remove unused length limits from TProtocol implementations
Consolidate Netty client and server implementations
Fix buffer leak in netty client implementation
Add header support to drift server
Fix sending of header parameters for Netty client
Add safety timeout for Netty method invoker
Update to parameternames 1.2 to fix non-system classloaders
Force integration tests to produce a main jar
Rename stats and pool config properties
Add wrapper extensible Address wrapper abstraction
Add automatic reloading to ssl context in Netty
Do not allow declaring non-Thrift exception classes
Add annotation processor to save Javadoc
